com.centurylink.mdw.activity.types

Interface SynchronizationActivity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GeneralActivity, SuspendibleActivity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SynchronizationActivity

    public interface SynchronizationActivity
extends GeneralActivity, SuspendibleActivity
    This interface is just to declare a special type and contains no additional method. The method needToWait() of the super class WaitActivity is used to determine whether the condition has been satisfied to move on.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.centurylink.mdw.activity.types.GeneralActivity

        execute, execute

      • Methods inherited from interface com.centurylink.mdw.activity.types.SuspendibleActivity

        needSuspend, resume, resumeWaiting
